isis.stitle: DT-466E and 530E Diesel Engine Service (1995 through 1999) - SECTION: INTRODUCTION - FUEL SYSTEM - FUEL SUPPLY PUMP PRESSURE

svcproc.title: FUEL SUPPLY PUMP PRESSURE
svcproc.para: The supply pump produces a regulated pressure of fuel. Fuel now flows from the supply pump to the fuel filter header. Fuel then travels through an internal passage into the fuel filter. Fuel passes through the fuel filter, from the outside of the filter element to the filter header spud,. Fuel then flows from the filter header through an external hose or line to the fuel supply manifold.
